snippet: Patrick J. Kennedy and Kevin A. Sabet say the marketing tactics of Big Tobacco are being used to sell pot where it is legal.
abstract: Letter from former Rep Patrick J Kennedy and former drug policy adviser Kevin A Sabet comments on both April 23 editorial and David A Kessler and Matthew L Myers Op-Ed about dangers of e-cigarettes.
lead_paragraph: Patrick J. Kennedy and Kevin A. Sabet say the marketing tactics of Big Tobacco are being used to sell pot where it is legal.
